question: It is permissible to ban a habitual thief from the Musjid????
answer:
QUESTION
Is it permissible to ban a habitual thief from the Musjid when one of the conditions of a Musjid is Izn-e-Aam (general permission)?
ANSWER


Share:
It is permissible to prevent a habitual thief from coming to the Musjid. (Shaami vol.1 pg.661; HM Sa?eed)

Al-Mahmood 18
